page.title: 19GAMES AND PURSUITS
page.content: {BRITISH BULLDOG }- This game is very popular particularly with the cubs and scouts. A person is chosen to be "up". He stands in the middle of the playing area while all the others stand on one side or the other. When they are told to go they have to run across to the other side. The person who is "up" must try to catch them,lift them up and shout"British Bulldog". When they are caught they join the "catcher". The game continues until there is only one person left. He is the winner. {FOX AND HOUNDS }- In this game two teams are chosen. One team is the foxes and the other is the hounds. The fox team runs away and hides while the hounds count to 50. The hounds then go to seek out and catch the foxes before they can get "home".
